name: Soda Clicker
description:
Soda clicker is a free, rough prototype based on the popular clicker games where instead you enter the tasteful world of soda drinks.
Please keep in mind that this is a rough prototype based on making the core mechanics with persistent player data, tool tips and the ability to purchase equipment and upgrades as well as using the time of the system to generate extra soda when not playing the game up to a certain length of time.
It is more of a core demo prototype than full fledged release.

A new version is included in the .zip file containing an android based .apk to allow you to play the new mobile version on your phone! Simply drag and drop it somewhere into your phone and use the file or folder search to find the .apk and install it!
Please note that you may need developer controls enabled to access such functionality and it is worth googling how to do this for your phone.
